unit.stdout:
Using mock addon for testing infrastructure
Using mock addon for testing infrastructure

  Memory Pool Unit Tests
    Buffer Allocation and Deallocation
      ✔ should allocate buffers from the pool
      ✔ should reuse buffers of the same size
      ✔ should handle pool size limits correctly
    Thread Safety Validation
      ✔ should handle concurrent allocations safely
    Memory Leak Detection
      ✔ should not leak memory over multiple allocation cycles
      ✔ should clean up expired buffers (108ms)
    Pool Statistics Accuracy
      ✔ should track buffer creation statistics accurately
      ✔ should track peak memory usage correctly
    Error Handling
      ✔ should handle invalid buffer sizes gracefully
      ✔ should handle buffer return errors gracefully

Sharp not available - some tests will be skipped
Detected SIMD capabilities: SSE2, SSE4.1, AVX2
WebP SIMD optimizations: SIMD optimizations enabled for pixel conversion and WebP encoding
Small (256x256): 50.07 MP/s (19.63ms for 15 iterations)
Medium (1024x768): 86.14 MP/s (9.13ms for 1 iterations)
Large (1920x1080): 78.40 MP/s (26.45ms for 1 iterations)
Ultra (3840x2160): 76.65 MP/s (108.21ms for 1 iterations)
SIMD performance: 316.33ms for 10 iterations
SIMD WebP encoding: 6.64ms, 11.2:1 compression
Solid Color: 11.200341807306131:1 compression ratio
Gradient: 11.200341807306131:1 compression ratio
Chess Pattern: 11.200341807306131:1 compression ratio
Random Noise: 11.200341807306131:1 compression ratio

  SIMD Converter Unit Tests
    CPU Feature Detection
      ✔ should detect SIMD capabilities correctly
      ✔ should provide WebP SIMD optimization info
    Pixel Format Conversion
      ✔ should convert BGRA to RGBA correctly
      ✔ should convert RGBA to RGB correctly
      ✔ should perform in-place BGRA to RGBA conversion
    SIMD Performance Benchmarks
      ✔ should perform BGRA->RGBA conversion efficiently for Small (256x256)
      ✔ should perform BGRA->RGBA conversion efficiently for Medium (1024x768)
      ✔ should perform BGRA->RGBA conversion efficiently for Large (1920x1080) (51ms)
      ✔ should perform BGRA->RGBA conversion efficiently for Ultra (3840x2160) (183ms)
      ✔ should demonstrate SIMD performance advantage (360ms)
    Advanced SIMD WebP Encoding
      ✔ should encode using SIMD-optimized WebP encoder
      ✔ should handle various image formats correctly (42ms)
    Error Handling and Edge Cases
      ✔ should handle invalid input dimensions gracefully
      ✔ should handle mismatched buffer sizes
      ✔ should handle extreme image dimensions


  25 passing (1s)
